item.title: Formal Notice sent to Brent Wible, Senior Counselor, Office of the Assistant Attorney General at the DOJ
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2124_0800_formal_notice_brent_wible_doj_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 05, 2024, 21:24 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 05, 2024, 08:24 -0500 (Eastern Standard Time) To: Brent Wible (Senior Counselor, Office of the Assistant Attorney General at the DOJ) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2124_0800_formal_notice_brent_wible_doj_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Wible, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.

item.title: Formal Notice sent to Javier Urbina, Prosecutor at U.S. Department of Justice, Criminal Division
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2058_0800_formal_notice_javier_urbina_doj_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 05, 2024, 20:58 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 05, 2024, 07:58 -0500 (Eastern Standard Time) To: Javier Urbina (Prosecutor at DOJ, Criminal Division, MLARS) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2058_0800_formal_notice_javier_urbina_doj_Redacted.pdf Dear Mr. Urbina, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
